definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Hu
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Judge Stephens allowed no foolishness when he held court.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂芬斯法官開庭時不允許人胡來。

sentences.english: I'll protect my fame here, no one dares to mess up with me.
sentences.chinese: 我會維護自己的面子，沒人敢跟我胡來的。

sentences.english: How can bear to see love is difficult and emotional unforgivable love to mess things up.
sentences.chinese: 可怎麼忍心看愛有爲難，情感也不能饒恕愛胡來。

sentences.english: Marshall stopped fooling around with other girls when he met Jessica.
sentences.chinese: 自從遇見傑西卡，馬歇爾就不再與其他女孩胡來了。

sentences.english: If the correct way to do it is the wrong way, then I yield.
sentences.chinese: 如果胡來纔是準確的方法的話，那我閉嘴。

sentences.english: Old summer for everyone in the hall after the meeting and tell them not to fool around.
sentences.chinese: 老夏在大廳裏給大家開會並告訴他們以後不要胡來。

sentences.english: If you don't know how to do it， don't fool with it.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不會幹就別胡來。

sentences.english: I also take money away if he acts out.
sentences.chinese: 如果他胡來，我也會把錢拿走。

definition: to use public office to avenge private wrongs
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to behead
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
narrow/petty-minded
shameless/(slang) rascal
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
